participant_1.background:
I went to the beach and wore my favorite pair of sweatpants.
I'm excited to share my new Renaissance Faire outfit with my date!
I wish my car wasn't acting up so I could get to my music lesson on time.
i make ask a year.
i am always early.

participant_2.background:
I met my husband at a dog park and we fell in love over our shared love of animals.
i run more then 2 miles a day even though i hate it.
my temper is pretty short.
My most difficult challenge was raising my children on my own.
I often take my kids out to dinner to remind me of my childhood.

content.text: It's nice to meet you! What is your name?
I'm [name].  How are you doing today?
I'm doing well, thank you!  What are your hobbies?
I love to go to the beach and listen to music.  I also love the Renaissance Faire.  How about you?
I love animals!  I met my husband at a dog park.  I also run every day, even though I hate it!
That is so cool!  I admire your dedication to running.  I love animals too, but I don't have any of my own right now.
I have two cats and a dog.  They are my best friends.  What do you do for a living?
I am a music teacher.  I love sharing my love of music with my students.  How about you?
I am a stay-at-home mom.  I love raising my children.  It's hard work, but it's the most rewarding thing I've ever done.
That's amazing!  I have a lot of respect for stay-at-home moms.
Thank you!  It's a tough job, but it's worth it.  What do you do for fun?
I love to go out to dinner with my friends.  I also love to travel.
I love to travel too!  I've been to a lot of different countries.
That's so cool!  I've only been to a few countries.
I'm sure you'll get to travel to more places in the future.
